code:
graph TB
  subgraph PerformanceBenchmarks[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    subgraph LatencyBenchmarks[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
      subgraph TransactionLatencyBench[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        TransTarget[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        TransActual[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        TransImprovement[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

        TransTarget --> TransActual
        TransActual --> TransImprovement
      end

      subgraph ConsolidationLatencyBench[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        ConsTarget[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        ConsActual[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        ConsImprovement[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]

        ConsTarget --> ConsActual
        ConsActual --> ConsImprovement
      end
    end

    subgraph AvailabilityBenchmarks[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
      subgraph TransactionAvailabilityBench[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        TransAvailTarget[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        TransAvailActual[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        TransAvailImprovement[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]

        TransAvailTarget --> TransAvailActual
        TransAvailActual --> TransAvailImprovement
      end

      subgraph ErrorRateBench[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        ErrorRateTarget[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        ErrorRateActual[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        ErrorRateImprovement[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

        ErrorRateTarget --> ErrorRateActual
        ErrorRateActual --> ErrorRateImprovement
      end
    end

    subgraph ConsistencyBenchmarks[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
      subgraph EventualConsistencyBench[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        EventualTarget[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        EventualActual[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        EventualImprovement[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

        EventualTarget --> EventualActual
        EventualActual --> EventualImprovement
      end

      subgraph ConvergenceTimeBench[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        ConvergenceTarget[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        ConvergenceActual[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
        ConvergenceImprovement[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]

        ConvergenceTarget --> ConvergenceActual
        ConvergenceActual --> ConvergenceImprovement
      end
    end

    subgraph ArchitecturalBenchmarks[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
      subgraph IndependenceBench[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        IndependenceTarget[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        IndependenceActual[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
        IndependenceImprovement[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

        IndependenceTarget --> IndependenceActual
        IndependenceActual --> IndependenceImprovement
      end

      subgraph ScalabilityBench[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        ScalabilityTarget[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
        ScalabilityActual[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        ScalabilityImprovement[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]

        ScalabilityTarget --> ScalabilityActual
        ScalabilityActual --> ScalabilityImprovement
      end
    end

    subgraph ThroughputBenchmarks[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
      subgraph RequestThroughput[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        ThroughputComparison[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
      end

      subgraph LoadHandling[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
        LoadCapability[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
      end
    end

    subgraph ResourceEfficiency[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
      subgraph NetworkEfficiency[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
        NetworkUsage[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
      end

      subgraph ComputeEfficiency[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
        VirtualUserScaling[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
      end
    end
  end

  subgraph BenchmarkSummary[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    subgraph OverallRating[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
      ExcellentRating[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    end

    subgraph KeyAchievements[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
      SubSecondLatency[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]

      PerfectReliability[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]

      DataIntegrity[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]

      ArchitecturalSoundness[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    end
  end

  %% Relationships
  TransImprovement --> ExcellentRating
  ConsImprovement --> ExcellentRating
  ErrorRateImprovement --> PerfectReliability
  IndependenceImprovement --> ArchitecturalSoundness
  EventualImprovement --> DataIntegrity

  %% Styling
  classDef target fill:#fff3e0,stroke:#f57c00,stroke-width:2px
  classDef actual fill:#e8f5e8,stroke:#4caf50,stroke-width:3px
  classDef improvement fill:#e3f2fd,stroke:#1976d2,stroke-width:2px
  classDef excellent fill:#e8f5e8,stroke:#388e3c,stroke-width:4px
  classDef achievement fill:#f3e5f5,stroke:#7b1fa2,stroke-width:3px

  class TransTarget,ConsTarget,TransAvailTarget,ErrorRateTarget,EventualTarget,ConvergenceTarget,IndependenceTarget,ScalabilityTarget target
  class TransActual,ConsActual,TransAvailActual,ErrorRateActual,EventualActual,ConvergenceActual,IndependenceActual,ScalabilityActual actual
  class TransImprovement,ConsImprovement,TransAvailImprovement,ErrorRateImprovement,EventualImprovement,ConvergenceImprovement,IndependenceImprovement,ScalabilityImprovement improvement
  class ExcellentRating excellent
  class SubSecondLatency,PerfectReliability,DataIntegrity,ArchitecturalSoundness achievement
